overview: By focusing on snowboarding, and not any one aspect of it, Creative Differences does what no other video can: showcase top riders doing it all. Gnarly backcountry lines, street rails, natural hits and sculpted booters, road gaps, limited but top-notch park/pipe, mixed in with never-before-seen footage on a car tow-in parking lot step-down, snowmobile tow-in river step-up and acid drops from light towers and trees. High-end filming and clean editing make this DVD a must see. Riders featured include Jared McCrum, Ryan Johannesen, Lane Power, Nick Brown, Joanne Dzierzawski, Tim Barker, Mike Weir, and Chase Harriman.
title: Creative Differences
